# manta Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    manta = {
      source  = "registry.terraform.io/scitas/manta" # to be confirmed
      version = ">= 0.0.1"
    }
  }
  required_version = ">= 1.0.0"
}

provider "manta" {
  base_url     = var.base_url
  access_token = var.access_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `base_url` (String)

### Optional

- `access_token` (String, Sensitive)
